plist.dict:
# BigSurDataUUID folder is located on diskXs3 (previously it matched with SystemUUID) # rename BigSurDataUUID as the output of : diskutil info diskXs1 | grep UUID
Kernel Cache \BigSurDataUUID\BootKernelExtensions.kc Kernel Flags root-dmg=file:///BigSurDataUUID/BaseSystem.dmg -no_compat_check amfi_get_out_of_my_way=1 -v
